biotools.summary:
Vaxign-ML is a supervised machine learning classification to predict protective antigens. This tool is a supervised machine learning reverse vaccinology model for improved prediction of bacterial protective antigens.

Vaxign-ML (Vaxign - Machine Learning) is a machine learning-based vaccine candidate prediction and analysis system based on the principle of reverse vaccinology.
